name: .XCCONFIG File Extension
summary: Learn about .XCCONFIG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Configuration file created by Xcode, a Mac OS X software development application; stores parameters for configuring the build of Xcode projects; can be referenced by multiple Xcode projects to use the same build settings.

content: To create the XCCONFIG file, open the project you want to create the XCCONFIG file for, select File → New → File..., choose "Other" (under iOS and OS X), select "Configuration Settings File," name the file, choose the save location, and click Create.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
